Change Log
==========

0.0.1 (14/10/2022)
-----------------
- First Release

0.0.2 (15/10/2022)
-----------------
- Bug Fixes

0.0.3 (16/02/2023)
-----------------
- New Gui in the server code

0.0.4 (28/02/2023
-----------------
- Xml files will be stored in a directory
- Passwords of wifi will be stored in a directory as well
- New move system with "shutil"
- New system that detects encrypted passwords
- Better Documentation
